title: Deputy Leader
description: Recruiting and training of the candidates for the International Olympiad in Informatics. Also planning of our participation on our annual participation on the event.

title: International Olympiad in Informatics Contestant
description: I was a contestant representing my country (Venezuela) for two years in a row in the International Olympiads in Informatics, a global event that challanges students from all over the globe with problem solving algorithms.
